text: Teasing is a word with different meanings. With humans, teasing usually means either playful and hurtful. Teasing is often unkind, and is sometimes a type of harassment. It can have a sexual context as well, as to create sexual arousal in someone, for example. ==Related pages== *Bullying == Other websites == *Stories and advice on stopping teasing. *The Art of the Teaser Category:Bullying Category:Human behavior
title: Teasing
